text: Nitwajombwesye mbwani wanache wa Israila, basi Firiauna ni asilikali wakwe wakuyiye wanganyao mwa uwwanga ni umagongo, kwikanila ndema jakunsimene (Firiauna) kumilwa jwatite: “Ngulupilile yanti: Pangali jwakuwajilwa kun’galagatila ikaweje Ajula jwankulupilile wanache wa Israila, soni une ndili mwa Asilamu.”
